alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 4:30AM CST until November 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix of light freezing drizzle, light freezing rain, light snow, and freezing fog. * WHERE...Eddy County and most of West Texas west of the Pecos. * WHEN...Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Light ice on exposed surfaces may impact travel in some areas. Check on pipes, plants, and people. Wind chills of 15 to 20 degrees are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.
